ModuleAnchor.helper: Used to create #anchor-links on the page (numbers, letters, hyphens only).

Image.helper: Use a 2400 × 1200 px (2:1) image, preferably WebP (JPG fallback), optimized to ≤ 350 KB (WebP) or ≤ 500 KB (JPG), with important content centered so it crops cleanly on all screen sizes.

ImageAlt.helper: Describe the image for screenreader & other nonvisual web browsers.

TitleIcon.helper: Find icons at FontAwesome

SubtitleIcon.helper: Find icons at FontAwesome

PaText.helper: If any text is entered, the primary action button will attempt to render.

PaCssClass.helper: Applied to the primary action link.

PaLabel.helper: Describe the button's action for screenreaders & other nonvisual web browsers.

PaIcon.helper: Find icons at FontAwesome

SaText.helper: If any text is entered, the primary action button will attempt to render.

SaCssClass.helper: Applied to the secondary action link.

SaLabel.helper: Describe the button's action for screenreaders & other nonvisual web browsers.

SaIcon.helper: Find icons at FontAwesome
